column5: Montreal was fun as always!!...lot's of people this year and the feedbacks were just great on the rods and the new ''Fighter'' reel!....Fishingstuff @ ICAST for 2012??!....would be a blast for sure! Now!,,,bring on open water please! Yan

Well, there was a ton of people there.Lots of charters and guiding services.The usual Boat brands, and outboard motor brands, but i was disappointed in the representation of some of the major lure and bait companies.Live Target were not even there Rapala was well represented and i picked up a few clackin cranks and clackin jerks.Shimano was there, as well as Abu, and BTW Solo, i spoke to a rep about the trouble you had with your reel.He was truly saddened by your treatment, and assured me that it was not the standard for the company, and yours was not the only complaint.He assured me that new policy has been put into place and that customer service reps were being retrained  I also met Loic and his crew from Fishinstuff. I finally got a chance to examine their rods and new reels closely. Amazing quality products to say the least.The rods are well balanced and sensitive, and the new line of reels are smooth and solid.The reels are spincasters, with a new line of baitcasting coming out next year.Here they are. Loic is the one on the left. Nice Guy too !!   All in all,a nice outting.               Come on soft water !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Paul

Looks like a good time....I have been to so many that I know only go every 3 years or so.....last year I took the bride to the one in Harrisburg, PA....HUGE and friggen PACKED with people.....TOO MANY people, you couldn't even get to some of the things I wanted to see.
Not making it today...going tomorrow

Tell me that you didn't do that   piv.... oh never mind  j/k  I know the guy in the middle on the first pic, he's from the Valley Thanks for taking the time to post your insights on the show Paul Leechman
Nice time to get a new boat. They had a nice Bayliner fish abd sky for unde 12K And SmokerCraft was on sale too, as well as the Princecraft Pro series.
Fishing rods Jacques....ya silly goose.!!!!!!!
Really  :rofl2:
Ya, and Loïc, I want one of those shirts!  PLEASE!
Stand in line Roy. After he reads my report, i get the first one
sound like you were fishing for something and from the looks of 1 pic there is a boat for $69.95!  get me one plz...
WOW Big spender !!! Thats about 10 bucks more than you spent on yours!!!

Went to the show today,and to tell the truth you guys have a much better show(Spring fishing show)The last 7 years I,ve travelled 12 hours there and back.Problem ours is hunting and camping too. We only had about 5 booths that actually sold fishing stuff.The others were the major manufactuer booths with their new products.I sure wasn't looking at some guys rods  ,this is how I roll.......
I'm sure i saw you there, i KNOW i saw her I even think i bumped into you at one point.Had a Pentax around my neck, and a WFN hat on.
They have a escort service there....  ...That's better then any USA show I have ever been to...   When is this show next year...
If they hear you speaking english, they figure yer from the states or ontarion and they are all over you!       NOT !!!!!!!!!
Monsieur Lafleur, you party animal you! Looks like you had a good time.
You were right Roy .....There was a booth selling bed sheets at the show Still shaking my head about that.
I know just enough Spanish and also a lot of sign language to get me in lots of trouble....
Oh, and i bought one of these on saturday too. More for the novelty, but its well made and i am gonna use it this season at least once    sposed to be good for fish up to 5lbs too.
Why does Lebaron's go to that show and not the one here????? I want to file a complaint!!!!!!!!!  those pen rods and reels were on sale at princess auto here awhile back.
We dont have a BPS Skeets. Sail didnt even show their faces to our show. Talk about independant

BPS wasnt at the show either.  Lebarons use to be at the show every year. I loved it cause i would go to there booth first, grab there catalog, then go to the rest of the booths. It was funny to go to a booth where they had a sign "Show Special" then look it up in the catalog and lebarons REGULAR price was cheaper.

Hy guys  thank you very much Mercman.   But sorry the shirts are for staff only ...  we had great feedbacks on our new Fishingstuff ''Fighter'' reel and record crowd this year... to resume : great success for us on this show !  maybe next year in Toronto....  Loïc

I was really happy to see that Le barons is cheaper for almost everything i compared with BPS. They had a huge booth at the montreal show.I bought a few lures and paid 3 bucks less each, than i paid for the same thing at BPS.

awesome pics!!!! it was a decent show, especially saturday and sunday with lots of people...i was @ laventurier du gouin fishing lodge booth..  did you guys see the girl at the fishing dominican republic booth???? hahaha i wont say anymore, off to gatineau this week for the fishing show!
